name: nft-mint?
description: nft-mint? is used to instantiate an asset and set that asset"s owner to the recipient principal. The asset must have been defined using define-non-fungible-token, and the supplied asset-identifier must be of the same type specified in that definition.
If an asset identified by asset-identifier already exists, this function will return an error with the following error code:
Otherwise, on successfuly mint, it returns (ok true).
